content: yes @Abhishek Prasad , run ~logs in the channel and it'll tell you (I think it's also in the topic)
What is the name of the channel? Is it on freenode?
@Abhishek Prasad the channel is #brlcad and yes, it is on freenode
I don't like the duplicated messages of BRL-CAD's IRC Bot in the #Google Code-in stream. Having them in #general is enough.

@Daniel Rossberg yeah, I wasn't sure at first. I'm not thrilled with the bridging. Even though the bot is subscribed to multiple streams, it only relays messages that are written to #brlcad so threaded conversations like this are not going to appear on IRC :/
the GCI one was an attempt to get it subscribed to multiple streams before I realized it wasn't even subscribing to the on stream fully. shutting it down.
actually looks like it shut itself down -- unhandled python exception in asyncio, connection lost. heh, great. that means the other one is probably going to need to be baby sat to keep it running.
